divs: sighting detailson a bicycle riding i looked up in a park in northern nj when hearing a jet. looking up, i noticed a commercial aircraft pass over and then stopped riding once noticing a star-like object sitting stationary near where the plane had just passed. this was 5pm in the evening in mid-july. it was either very small or very far and whitish\metal in color, basically a fat glowing dot just sitting there like a star or a satellite in broad daylight and blue sky. it must have been mostly white but was definitely shiny with a small tight halo, exactly like a star at nighttime. after sitting still for less then a minute it moved to the left and across the sky at roughly 300mph. it started to move left in a straight line at a constant speed and altitude (across the sky from left to right). after a few seconds of movement, i noticed an identical type of object moving over and past the original one in a diagonal direction (southwest to northeasst), at a higher altitude. no. 2 seemed to be moving faster, and seemed higher up then the originally noticed one. i tried to follow both at the same time looking back and forth from one to the other quickly. i lost the faster 2nd one in less then 10 seconds and then watched the original one move away very far until i couldn't see it any longer. a lady passed on a bike while it was about to move too far into the diatance for me to see. i looked at her and looked back at the object noticing it again before losing it in the diatance. i do not wear glasses and have 20\15 vision. was this a military or police surveillance uav? it was not a bird or a helicopter. i was kind of not suprised when watching this but kept saying that "this doesn't look normal" to myself during the whole time, prob 2-3 minutes in total. i did think to reach for my cell phone at one point in the begining to take a pic but did not have it with me. it would have been very difficult to capture the object(s) clearly with the poor resolution. it was very cool none the less.
